AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing Tweets, which gets tweets and other info from Twitter.
[p]tweets to see commands. Requires `tweepy`.
Do [p]tweetset to find commands for setting consumer key and secret and access token and secret. If you need these, visit https://apps.twitter.com/ and create an application.
This plugin only needs read only permissions as it will only read public information.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: Tweets
SHORT: Cog for getting info from Twitter
DESCRIPTION: Gets public information from Twitter's api
